title.text: LOR-KBGEN, A Hybrid Approach To Generating from the KBGen Knowledge-Base

abstractContent.text: This abstract describes a contribution to the 2013 KBGen Challenge from CNRS/LORIA and the University of Lor-raine.

Our contribution focuses on an attempt to automate the extraction of a Feature Based Tree Adjoining Grammar equipped with a unification based compo-sitional semantics which can be used to generate from KBGen data.
